title: EWC - EU Company Certificate
description: Schema for EU Company Certificate -  EWC WP3

issuing_authority.description: Name of the administrative authority that has issued this credential instance, or the ISO 3166 Alpha-2 country code of the respective Member State if there is no separate authority authorized to issue this credential.

issuing_authority_id.description: EUID of the issuing authority. (Business register identifier for BRIS)

issuing_country.description: Alpha-2 country code, as defined in ISO 3166-1, of the issuing country or territory.

issuing_jurisdiction.description: Country subdivision code of the jurisdiction that issued the credential instance, as defined in ISO 3166-2:2020, Clause 8. The first part of the code SHALL be the same as the value for issuing_country.

issuance_date.description: Date and possibly time of issuance

expiry_date.description: Date and possibly time of credential expiration

authentic_source_id.description: EUID for the public sector body or private entity responsible for an authentic source that is a repository or system, considered to be the primary source of information or recognized as authentic in national law.

authentic_source_name.description: Name of the public sector body or private entity responsible for an authentic source that is a repository or system, considered to be the primary source of information or recognized as authentic in national law.

legal_person_name.description: Official current legal person name as registered in the business register.

legal_person_id.description: Unique id for organisations in EUID structure

registration_member_state.description: Member State where the company is registered, Alpha-2 country code, as defined in ISO 3166-1

registered_address.description: Registered office of the company (full address or part of it)

care_of.description: Used when an address is at the address of another person or legal entity.

full_address.description: The complete address written as a string, separated with ";".

thorough_fare.title: Thoroughfare
thorough_fare.description: The name of a passage or way through from one location to another.

locator_designator.description: A number or a sequence of characters that uniquely identifies the locator within the relevant scope.

post_code.description: The code created and maintained for postal purposes to identify a subdivision of addresses and postal delivery points.

post_name.description: A name created and maintained for postal purposes to identify a subdivision of addresses and postal delivery points.

post_office_box.description: A location designator for a postal delivery point at a post office, usually a number.

locator_name.description: Proper noun(s) applied to the real world entity identified by the locator. The locator name could be the name of the property or complex, of the building or part of the building, or it could be the name of a room inside a building.

admin_unit_level_1.description: The uppermost administrative unit for the address, almost always a country.

admin_unit_level_2.description: The name of a secondary level/region of the address, usually a county, state or other such area that typically encompasses several localities.

registration_date.description: Date of registration of the company

share_capital.description: Amount of the capital subscribed with currency

currency.description: Currency code used of the capital subscribed, as defined in ISO 4217:2015

legal_entity_status.description: Status of the company as defined in national law and where recorded in the national register

legal_entity_activity.description: Object of the company describing its main activity or activities, which must be expressed using the Statistical Classification of Economic Activities in the European Community (NACE)

description.description: Short description of the legal entity activity

legal_entity_duration.description: Duration of the company, where its duration is limited

contact_point.description: Correspondence address of the company, such as electronic mail or postal address (full or partial)

legal_representative.description: Information about any person authorized by the company to represent it alone or jointly

credentialStatus.description: Defines suspension and/or revocation details for the issued credential. Further redefined by the type extension

id.description: Exact identity for the credential status

credentialSchema.description: One or more schemas that validate the Verifiable Credential.
Contains information about the credential schema on which the issued credential is based

id.description: References the credential schema stored on the Trusted Schemas Registry (TSR) on which the Verifiable Authorisation is based on

legal_representative.natural_person.description: Details about the representative of the company if incarnated by a natural person

full_name.description: Full name of the natural person representing the company

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of the natural person representing the company

nationality.description: Nationality of the natural person representing the company

signatory_rule.description: Information if the representative can engage the company alone or jointly

legal_representative.legal_person.description: Details about the representative of the company if incarnated by a legal person

legal_person_name.description: Official current legal person name as registered in the business register.

legal_person_id.description: Unique id for organisations in EUID structure
